import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline
t = int(input())
for t in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    if n % 2 != 0:
        print(-1)
    else:
        a = 0
        b = n // 2
        c = n - b
        print(a, b, c)

tc = int(input())
while tc > 0:
    n = int(input())
    ans = ''
    if bin(n)[-1] == '1':
        ans = '-1'
    else:
        n = n >> 1
        ans = '{} 0 0'.format(n)
    print(ans)
    tc = tc - 1
